subject: Fix Vercel 404s by restructuring project to deploy from repo root
body:
Vercel's GitHub integration uses the repo root as the project root,
but all config and function files were nested inside an api/ subdirectory.
This caused vercel.json to not be found and serverless functions to map
to /api/api/* instead of /api/*, resulting in 404s on all endpoints.

Flatten the structure: move config files (vercel.json, package.json,
tsconfig.json, etc.) to repo root, move serverless functions from
api/api/ to api/, and place favicons at repo root for static serving.
Update documentation paths accordingly.
